Inédits : 
(74037,362573)

(74037,362573)&(5007,484903)=(39522+-34515,423738-+61165)=(a,b)o(c,d) avec ac = 531*42, bd = 941*65, ad = 42*941 
(42,65)o(531,941) => 37741o6242740
